message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it's a great deal given its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I think the product is worth less than $120 to me. Would you consider selling it for $100?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go lower than $130. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering my valuation of the product, would you be open to discussing a price closer to $110?
